title: Buying Test Prep Books
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Sob......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, Chika! I didn’t think I’d run into you here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eli-san...... Waaahhhh!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Wha... What’s wrong!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I see... You’re here to buy some test prep books, but there are way too many to choose from...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Shima-nee gave me some money to go buy some test prep books...... But I accidentally spent too much on some other things, and now I’m not sure if I can buy any of those books... There are so many different ones that I don’t know which one to buy...... Sniff...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>D-Don’t cry! I’ll help you pick one out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh!? Really!? Thanks, Eli-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You should buy one for your weakest subject. Which one are you the weakest at, Chika?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Uh...... Um...... Which one...... am I weakest at......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, okay. Let’s pick out a general test prep book.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
